title: Bug 23935: Text widget with Tree parent does not lose focus
description: Both widgets are children of the shell. The right tree and text only work on Windows. We can probably work around by creating the text editor as a sibling of the tree and moving it above the tree.
OB: When clicking anywhere in the tree, the tree gains focus. On Linux, the text never loses focus when clicking on the tree. The text widget is a child of the tree, causing platform UI bug 2470.
EB: Build 20020920: Run the attached code. The left tree and text behave as expected on both Windows and Linux.
SR: Ensure that clicking on the tree does not shift focus away from the text widget on both Windows and Linux.
